comments.text:
1:00
Where is the front door? (From what I've learned in another video about 
complex international borders, there are some houses which are on the 
Dutch-Belgian border, but the locations of the front doors determine which 
country they are in. For example: if half of the house is in the 
Netherlands and the other half was in Belgium, but the front door was in 
the Netherlands, the entire house is officially in the Netherlands.)﻿
